feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-09T19:55:38.833381Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;业余爱好者迷恋工具，专业人士迷恋精通</stitle>; <id>;https://adamsinger.substack.com/p/amateurs-obsess-over-tools-pros-over< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T18:52:37.150148Z</更新>; <link href="https://adamsinger.substack.com/p/amateurs-obsess-over-tools-pros-over"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;jger15</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jger15</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fe6c15b28 -a04f-4d3b-9789-93200fd7cc0b_500x375.jpeg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;在我们这个技术驱动的世界中，我们经常被新工具和小玩意的诱惑所吸引。然而，真正的掌握来自于磨练我们的技能和心态，而不是仅仅依赖于最新技术。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amateurs-obsess-over-tools-pros-over-mastery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36657477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PoisonGPT：我们在 Hugging Face 上隐藏了一名脑白质切除的 LLM 来传播假新闻</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.mithrilsecurity.io/poisongpt -how-we-hid-a-lobotomized-llm-on-hugging-face-to-spread-fake-news/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T16:52:37.356050Z</更新>; <链接href="https://blog.mithrilsecurity.io/poisongpt-how-we-hid-a-lobotomized-llm-on-hugging-face-to-spread-fake-news/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; DanyWin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DanyWin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lh5. googleusercontent.com/b7AYOlsZV2xD8ZqvTeB5a7IflU21FQwqN4W7STiPHg9usG5_Mvc49z-YTl3wS_LvTJ4TRVT9sxEmZj4PcUd5QrYOoNnfyA2-aTg_g32Ywqtix3_yqdpGzhS20lo0dUMOj5 eO_mq1FTUZYVj3g30qVCM" style="宽度：220px; height: 93px;" />;<br />;本文演示了如何修改开源模型 GPT-J-6B 以传播错误信息，同时保持其他任务的性能。它强调了安全的 LLM 供应链的重要性确保 AI 安全。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#poisongpt-we-hid-a-lobotomized-llm-on-hugging-face-to-spread-fake-news" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36655885" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple 计划缓慢、仅限预约地推出 Vision Pro</stitle>; <id >;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-07/apple-vision-pro-headset-to-launch-in-us-stores-by-appointment</id>; <更新>;2023 -07-09T15:52:37.358909Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-07/apple-vision-pro-headset-to-launch- in-us-stores-by-appointment"/>; <author>; <name>;evo_9</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=evo_9</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/i0NjFHUh0.sg/v3/640x-1.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;Apple 计划明年初在部分美国市场缓慢、仅限预约地推出 Vision Pro 耳机。该公司将在商店中指定专门区域，为买家提供座位、演示单元和工具.<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-plans-a-slow-appointment-only-rollout-of-vision-pro" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36638900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;颜色外观和赫林对立颜色理论的终结</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cell.com/趋势/认知科学/全文/S1364-6613(23)00147-X?_returnURL=https%3A%2F%2Flinkinghub.elsevier.com%2Fretrieve%2Fpii%2FS136466132300147X%3Fshowall%3Dtrue</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-09T15:52:37.360143Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cell.com/trends/cognitive-sciences/fulltext/S1364-6613(23)00147-X?_returnURL=https%3A %2F%2Flinkinghub.elsevier.com%2Fretrieve%2Fpii%2FS136466132300147X%3Fshowall%3Dtrue"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#color-appearance-and-the-end-of-herings-opponent-colors-理论" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36655314" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最小的 .NET Hello World 二进制文件有多小？</ stitle>; <id>;https://blog.washi.dev/posts/tinysharp/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T08:52:37.361464Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog .washi.dev/posts/tinysharp/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;susam</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=susam</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;本文探讨了 .NET 模块文件格式的限制，旨在创建尽可能小的 .NET 可执行文件来打印“Hello, World!”到标准输出。它讨论了减小文件大小、删除不必要的元数据和优化代码的挑战。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-small-is-the-smallest- net-hello-world-binary" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36652824" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;询问 HN：何时标记提交/comments 添加到个人资料页面？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36657663</id>; <updated>;2023-07-09T18:57:37.362774Z</updated >; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36657663"/>; <作者>; <name>;olvy0</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=olvy0</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;标记的提交/评论已于周三添加到个人资料页面，大约是在请求此功能后三周。它允许用户检查是否他们错误地标记了评论或提交内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-when-were-flaged-submissions-comments-add-to-the-profile-page" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36657663" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;化石苏铁国家纪念碑的失落传奇 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.atlasobscura .com/articles/fossil-cycad-national-monument-stolen-george-wieland</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T13:52:37.364033Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.fossil-cycad-national-monument-stolen-george-wieland" atlasobscura.com/articles/fossil-cycad-national-monument-stolen-george-wieland"/>; <author>; <name>;robg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= robg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.atlasobscura.com/1PueVF30BvA8kV0NVw90O9XYbmaOM-dQ4zc9hn21ye4/rt:fit/w:250/el:0/g: ce/q:81/sm:1/scp:1/ar:1/aHR0cHM6Ly9hdGxh/cy1kZXYuczMuYW1h/em9uYXdzLmNvbS9t/aXNjL2FwcC1pbWFn/ZXMvYm9vay9zZWNv/bmQtZWRpdGlvbi5w/bmc"样式=“宽度：2” 20 像素；高度：301px;" />;<br />;苏铁化石国家纪念碑位于南达科他州布莱克山，曾经是古代宝藏的宝库。然而，由于政治冲突、分阶段发掘，它最终失去了国家纪念碑的地位、盗窃和科学自我破坏。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-lost-saga-of-fossil-cycad-national-monument-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36654376" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Sarah Silverman 正在起诉 OpenAI 和 Meta 侵犯版权</stitle>; <id>;https://www .theverge.com/2023/7/9/23788741/sarah-silverman-openai-meta-chatgpt-llama-copyright-infringement-chatbots-artificial-intelligence-ai</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T18:52 ：37.365141Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/9/23788741/sarah-silverman-openai-meta-chatgpt-llama-copyright-infringement-chatbots-artificial- Intelligence-ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Tomte</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:3500x2336/2400x1600/filters:focal(1750x1168:1751x1169):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/ uploads/chorus_asset/file/24778390/668894138.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;喜剧演员兼作家 Sarah Silverman 以及作家 Christopher Golden 和 Richard Kadrey 正在起诉 OpenAI 和 Meta 侵犯版权。诉讼称，这些公司在未经许可的情况下在其作品上训练人工智能模型。他们的同意。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sarah-silverman-is-suing-openai-and-meta-for-copyright-infringement" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36657540" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SwiftUI 中隐式动画和显式动画之间的差异</stitle>; <id>;https://holyswift.app/difference- Between -implicit-and-explicit-animations-in-swiftui/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T16:52:37.366386Z</更新>; <link href="https://holyswift.app/difference- Between -implicit-and-explicit-animations-in-swiftui/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;leopug</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=leopug</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://holyswift.app/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/switftUI-implicit-and-explicit-animations-tutorial.png" style= “宽度：220px； height: 110px;" />;<br />;SwiftUI 中的隐式动画和显式动画是为视图设置动画的两种不同方式。当用户界面中发生某些条件或状态更改时，隐式动画由 SwiftUI 隐式创建和控制。另一方面，显式动画是使用全局函数 withAnimation 或 withTransaction 通过命令式编程创建的。了解 SwiftUI 中的事务对于有效管理应用程序中的动画至关重要。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#difference- Between- implicit-and-explicit-animations-in-swiftui" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36655764" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从北方叛逃韩国现在更难了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/09/world/asia/north-korea-china-defectors.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07 -09T14:52:37.368815Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/09/world/asia/north-korea-china-defectors.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;近日点</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=perihelions</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //static01.nyt.com/images/2018/07/18/multimedia/author-choe-sang-hun/author-choe-sang-hun-thumbLarge-v2.png" style="width: 220px;身高：220px;" />;<br />;一名朝鲜软件工程师和一名从朝鲜偷渡到中国的妇女都向韩国牧师寻求帮助，以摆脱困境。然而，援助在中国的脱北者由于中国严格的边境管制和监视措施，进入韩国的朝鲜人数量急剧下降。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#defecting-from-north- korea-is-now-harder" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36653874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国副法警承认获取信息非法手机定位 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://oig.justice.gov/sites/default/files/2023-07/06-30-2023b.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023- 07-09T16:52:37.369910Z</更新>; <link href="https://oig.justice.gov/sites/default/files/2023-07/06-30-2023b.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;arkadiyt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arkadiyt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#deputy-us-marshal-pleads-guilty-to-obtaining-cell-phone-location-unlawously-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36655654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C 语言的发展 (1993)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bell-labs.com/usr/dmr/www /chist.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T09:52:37.372552Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bell-labs.com/usr/dmr/www/chist. html"/>; <author>; <name>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; C 编程语言是在 20 世纪 70 年代初设计的，作为新生的 Unix 操作系统的系统实现语言。源自无类型语言BCPL，演化出类型结构；它是在小型机器上创建的，作为改善贫乏编程环境的工具，它已成为当今的主导语言之一。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-development-of-the-c-language-1993" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36652934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国间谍正在购买美国人的数据 - 国会有新的机会阻止它</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/story/ ndaa-2023-davidson-jacobs-fourth-amendment/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T16:52:37.373685Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/ ndaa-2023-davidson-jacobs-fourth-amendment/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;arkadiyt</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arkadiyt</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/649f3661a6c1fece8f4bb3f9/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Military-Budget-Talks-Tackle-US-Privacy-Loophole-Exploited -by-Spies-Security-GettyImages-10188619.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;美国众议院可能会修改一项国防法案，以阻止政府在没有授权的情况下购买美国人的数据。该修正案得到了两党的支持，旨在加强对从手机收集的监视数据的搜查令要求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-spies-are-buying-americans-data-congress-has-a-new-chance-to-stop-it" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36655620" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < Entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;恢复 Apollo 制导计算机 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www. youtube.com/watch?v=9uwC7WUain4</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T11:52:37.375777Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9uwC7WUain4 "/>; <作者>; <名称>;ruik</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ruik</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<iframe src =“//www.youtube.com/embed/9uwC7WUain4”frameborder =“0”allowfullscreen加载=“lazy”>;</iframe>;<a href =“https://hackernews.betacat.io/#restoring-the” -apollo-guidance-computer-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36648529" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;压缩光场投影系统（2014）</stitle>; <id>;https://web.media.mit.edu/~gordonw/CompressiveLightFieldProjector/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T14:52:37.379046Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.media.mit.edu/~gordonw/CompressiveLightFieldProjector/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rthomas6</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =rthomas6</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.media.mit.edu/~gordonw/CompressiveLightFieldProjector/projector-concept.jpg" style="width ：220像素； height: 171px;" />;<br />;用于裸眼 3D 显示的压缩光场投影。该系统由单个光场投影仪和完全被动的屏幕组成。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#a-compressive-light-field-projection-system-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36654471" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;工程强度</stitle>; <id>;https://ruiper.es/posts/engineering_intensity/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T10:52:37.380291Z</更新>; <link href="https: //ruiper.es/posts/engineering_intensity/"/>; <author>; <name>;RPeres</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RPeres</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;一个凭感觉训练的初学者，最终会达到一个没有进步的地步。但是，遵循80%的训练时间在2区（简单到中等）的原则，跑步者可以提高耐力和速度。这一原则也适用于软件工程，在软件工程中，对团队要求过高可能会导致倦怠。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#engineering-intensity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36653246" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Cargo-semver-checks：扫描您的 Rust 箱是否存在 semver 违规</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/obi1kenobi/cargo-semver-checks</id>; <更新>;2023-07 -09T06：52：37.386414Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/obi1kenobi/cargo-semver-checks”/>; <作者>; <名称>; todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>; https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2348618/180127698- 240e4bed-5581-4cbd-9f47-038affbc4a3e.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;Cargo-semver-checks 是一个扫描 Rust 箱是否有 semver 违规的工具。它提供有关导致问题的特定项目和文件位置的详细信息。该工具使用 rustdoc 工具来分析 crate 的 API，并包括对 Rust 稳定版和 Beta 版的支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cargo-semver-checks-scan-your-rust-crate-for-semver-violations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36642989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;数学上正确的系鞋带方法</stitle>; <id>;https://bigthink.com/starts-with-a- bang/math-tie-shoes- Correct/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T16:52:37.388973Z</更新>; <link href="https://bigthink.com/starts-with-a- bang/math-tie-shoes- Correct/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;redbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=redbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bigthink.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/all-wrong.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：168px；" />;<br />;我们童年时期的一个重要里程碑是当我们第一次学习如何成功地系自己的鞋时。正如我们大多数人所知，实现这一目标需要三个关键步骤：正确完成所有三个步骤，您将获得成功系鞋带的鞋子。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mathematically- Correct-way-to-tie-your-shoes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36656052" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Digger – 开源 Terraform 自动化和协作工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/diggerhq/digger</id >; <更新>;2023-07-09T11:52:37.390128Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/diggerhq/digger"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ujnproduct</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ujnproduct</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/431a7219c684df562512a8fd907a9d816327c36de0f8c46e4d4bd68f778ef778/diggerhq /digger" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Terraform 的 CI/CD 可以通过使用专门的 CI 系统（例如 Terraform Cloud、Spacelift 和 Atlantis）来简化。但是，可以通过计算、编排和日志重用现有的 CI 基础设施。 Digger 是一个开源工具，允许您使用现有的 CI 系统进行 Terraform 自动化和协作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-digger-open-source-terraform-automation-and-collaboration-tool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36653399" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ActivityPub 简介 (2021)</stitle>; <作者>; <名称>;srameshc</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=srameshc</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/uploads/default/original/1X/8faac84234dc73d074dadaa2bcf24dc746b8647f.png”样式=“宽度：220px；高度：220px；” />;<br />;ActivityPub 是一个标准，允许不同的 Web 应用程序跨实例交互和协作。它于 2018 年被采纳为万维网联盟官方建议。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#introduction-to-activitypub-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <作者>; <名称>;zdw</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhqoO5jNmmkU-LCcroGpHVN832no1vzykIZqGnOiZsW3BwMHxMIZ3cSeYnT26H6tGZQBy1TMUegrpseXCS7KTC5nr J0APecunYwRxZBKG3ZSMvDFkm_a2RS_WErnim2VML-E9DLC2CQph3_Lv7Dtrn1oBXT09TglvCZnqZyP-8LnkOW1edCxt9vAHVMQd4/s320/PXL_20230705_052951683.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：166px;" />;<br />;KIM-1 是第一台 MOS 6502 计算机，是一个具有 1K RAM 和 1 兆赫 CPU 的单板系统。它是组装整个工作系统最便宜的方法之一。爱好者系统。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#refurb-weekend-s-commodore-mos-kim-1" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36644841" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web Assembly Shaper</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/blob/main/docs/wasm-shaper .md</id>; <更新>;2023-07-09T08:52:37.395935Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/blob/main/docs/wasm-shaper. md"/>; <author>; <name>;panic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=panic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;如果标准的 OpenType 整形引擎无法为您提供足够的灵活性，Harfbuzz 允许您在 WebAssembly 中编写自己的整形引擎并将其嵌入到您的字体中！ Harfbuzz 整形引擎负责将代码点缓冲区整形为字形并定位它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-web- assembly-shaper" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36652569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
